headline: Jim Cramer on NRG: “I Think It’s a Very Well-Run Company”
summary: NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE:NRG) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar recently. When a caller asked if the stock could get a signature, Cramer “Booyah!”, he replied: “You are going to get a Booyah because I like the nuclear component there. I think it’s a very well-run company.” NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE:NRG) produces […]
